title: ICYMI - Eric Holder Discusses Rampant Gerrymandering, James Comey and His Hope for America
itunes:title: ICYMI - Eric Holder Discusses Rampant Gerrymandering, James Comey and His Hope for America
description:
Former Attorney General Eric Holder talks about gerrymandering's effect on democracy, corruption in the Trump administration and rumors that he'll run for president in 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
